thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 15 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Colas Rail Wins Three Rail Network Renewal And Maintenance Contracts

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Colas Rail Wins Three Rail Network Renewal And Maintenance Contracts

organizations.name: brief-colas rail wins three rail network renewal and maintenance contracts

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - COLAS SA:
* COLAS RAIL WINS THREE RAIL NETWORK RENEWAL AND MAINTENANCE CONTRACTS IN FRANCE AND THE UNITED KINGDOM
* TOTAL OF APPROXIMATELY €300 MILLION IN A CONSORTIUM WITH TSO (A SUBSIDIARY OF NGE)‍​
* COLAS RAIL LTD, BRITISH SUBSIDIARY OF COLAS RAIL, AWARDED A 7-YEAR TRACK MAINTENANCE CONTRACT BY NETWORK RAIL WORTH £225 MILLION
* 2 MAINTENANCE CONTRACTS FOR FRENCH RAIL NETWORK AWARDED BY SNCF RÉSEAU, FOR TOTAL OF ABOUT €300 MILLION IN CONSORTIUM WITH TSO Source text: bit.ly/2B49KQg Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom:)
